Item.name: Autohonker
Item.description: When akimbo bikehorns are not enough.

Item.name: Clown Body Armor
Item.description: Four kilograms of rubberbands and kevlar wrapped around a blanket. It works.
A tool that fires a seemingly unending amount of bananas from its drum magazine. Requires oxygen tanks.

Item.name: Mother's Vengenace
Item.description: A weapon worthy only of the Mother's most faithful. Burns nonbelievers.

Item.name: Clown A.S.S. Rifle
Item.description: A very interesting version of the Separatist distributed Assault Rifle modified by clowns to be easier to use and hurt a little bit more. HONK! HONK!! HONK!!! HONK!!!!

Item.name: Waterlogged Ancient Outfit
Item.description: A very old waterlogged outfit from an alien ruin that you can hardly fit into. May require further processing to make into something more usable. (All damage modifiers are probability multipliers.)

Item.name: Prototype Banana Launcher
Item.description: A device that uses the same enigmatic tech that's inside a Funbringer 6000, just inside the convenience of grenade launcher now. Its the perfect weapon for an aspiring slapstick comedian.
